column5: Last weekend the wife and I decided to explore some new areas north of the Napanee with the canoe.  The weather was absolutely beautiful, but the horse/deer flies were NASTY . I caught a bunch of OOS smallies (sorry but I left out all video of Smallmouth) while searching for splake, the water was gin clear with no weeds.  I took some video of our trip... hope you enjoy.  Cheers Jason   http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0YG8_MmOUfg
Thanks for that Jason... you could sure give Les Stroud a run for his money on the camera work!
nice work. great shots.  we got a go pro to mess around with this weekend on our portage bass trip.  great inspiration for us here.  thanks for sharing.
Beautiful camera work! What camera were you using and how did you mount it so high on the bow of the canoe?
Nice video! You have a pretty good wide angle lens on your camera - what are you using?
Thanks everyone....it's just a Go Pro HD and mounts to canoe
Nice video buddy. Wish I was able to join you this weekend.
